lead_paragraph: The fashion designer says the most important relationship, in business and in life, is the one you have with yourself. (With video.)

headline.print_headline: The Key to Success Is Trusting Yourself
headline.main: Diane von Furstenberg: The Key to Success Is Trusting Yourself

snippet: The fashion designer says the most important relationship, in business and in life, is the one you have with yourself. (With video.)
abstract: Adam Bryant Corner Office column features interview with fashion designer Diane von Furstenberg, who discusses her career and management technique.
